content: created as a happy accident while watching a double-feature at the movies this basic ribbed hat mutated diagonally into an easy design that is great for all ages and genders a fun and simple hat that is knit in the round creating a diagonal ribbing for the band and basic stockinette for the dome this is a great portable project while out and about or for mindless knitting **materials needed ** * us 7 4 5mm circular needle &/or dpn or appropriate needle to reach gauge * any comfortable worsted or aran weight yarn to meet gauge * stitch marker * darning needle for weaving in ends *example was knit as large using cascade yarns cherub aran using size us 7 needles*
